title: [Diving]. Thrills on ice. Acrobatic marvels.
brief_description: A compilation of three cinemagazine items: 1. [Diving] No title: Diving at outdoor pool near Luna Park, St Kilda and from Prince’s Bridge, Melbourne city. 2. Thrills on ice: Ice skaters in performance at indoor ice rink (St Moritz, St Kilda?). 3. Acrobatic marvels: Demonstration by acrobats in parkland.
